word: MRS. WHITE WAS ENGAGED IN EVANGELICAL WORK FOR MORE THAN SEVENTY YEARS. HER PUBLIC MINISTRY BEGAN IN MAINE, AND CLOSED IN CALIFORNIA. SHE ADDRESSED CONGREGATIONS, LARGE AND SMALL, ON RELIGIOUS AND TEMPERANCE THEMES, IN NEARLY EVERY STATE IN THE UNION. SHE ALSO SPENT TWO YEARS OF VERY ACTIVE SERVICE IN ENGLAND, FRANCE, SWITZERLAND, GERMANY, DENMARK, NORWAY, AND SWEDEN; AND EIGHT YEARS IN AUSTRALIA, NEW ZEALAND, AND TASMANIA.
